author: .paulharris
content: https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/459 - are we shelving a v2 event stream for now given that 472 defined a singleAttestation event?

author: jgm

author: .paulharris
content: thats what i was thinking, I'll just close the PR.
